rows.label: bf11030100_0010
rows.name: Are you alright? Are you the only one?

rows.label: bf11030100_0020
rows.name: Doesn't look like anyone else made it.

rows.label: bf11030100_0030
rows.name: The way these places were burned... this wasn't Metsu.

rows.label: bf11030100_0040
rows.name: Most likely the work of humans...

rows.label: bf11030100_0050
rows.name:
Looters, taking advantage
of all the chaos in the world.

rows.label: bf11030100_0060
rows.name: If you want, why don't you come with us?

rows.label: bf11030100_0070
rows.name:
It's okay, you don't have to be afraid.
They're all really nice people, I promise.

rows.label: bf11030100_0110
rows.name: We can help you pay your respects, if you'd like...

rows.label: bf11030100_0180
rows.name:
I was sold. Came here from Estham.
So I don't have a family.

rows.label: bf11030100_0200
rows.name:
Okay, then! From this day forward,
we'll be your family!

rows.label: bf11030100_0205
rows.name:
When we get back to our mercenary group,
you'll see there are lots of...

rows.label: bf11030100_0210
rows.name:
How? You're complete strangers.
You don't have to pity me.

rows.label: bf11030100_0260
rows.name: Then again, I suppose I used to be just like that...

rows.label: bf11030100_0270
rows.name:
Well... if not family, what about starting as friends?
Would that be okay?

rows.label: bf11030100_0310
rows.name: I'm going to scout the perimeter. Look after the boy.
